en: Human life,like flood water and do not hear of islands and reefs,it is difficult to create beautiful waves.
cn: 人的生命，似洪水奔流，不遇着岛屿和暗礁，难以激起美丽的浪花。

en: But all sunshine without shade, all pleasure without pain, is not life at all.
cn: 但只有阳光没有阴影，只有快乐没有痛苦，根本不是真正的生活。

en: Don't know if we each have a destiny, or if we’re all just floating around accidental—like on a breeze.
cn: 我不懂我们是否有着各自的命运，还是只是到处随风飘荡。

en: Sadness is easier because its surrender.
cn: 悲伤很容易，因为那是投降。

en: The cloud stood humbly in a corner of the sky. The morning crowned it with splendor.
cn: 白云谦卑地站在天边，晨光给它披上壮丽的光彩。--泰戈尔

en: The more we do, the more we can do. The busier we are, the more leisure we have.
cn: 事越做越会做，人越忙越有空。

en: Baby you've done enough that cut your breath.Don't beat yourself up don't need to turn so fast.Sometimes we come last but we did our best.
cn: 你已经受够了白费力气，请不要自暴自弃，也不必太快抽离，有时我们终能实现梦想只要我们竭尽全力。

en: We must hang together, or we'll be hanged separately.
cn: 我们必须团结在一起，否则我们将被一个个绞死。

en: Never trouble trouble till trouble troubles you.
cn: 麻烦没来找你，就别去自找麻烦。

en: All my life, I've only been pretending. Without me, his world will go on turning. A world that's full of happiness that I have never known.
cn: 这一生不过是自欺欺人罢了。没有我他的世界依然如故，那里满是我从未体会过的幸福。

en: You don't become what you want, you become what you believe.
cn: 不是成为你想要的，而是成为你所相信的。

en: Is life always this hard,or is it just when you are a kid?Always like this.
cn: 人生总是那么艰难吗？还是只有孩童时这样？  总是如此。

en: “You know, I'm really glad you decided to learn Mandarin.” “Why?”   “Once you're fluent, you'll have a billion more people to annoy instead of me.”
cn: “话说，你终于要学普通话了我还真高兴。”  “为嘛？” “等你说顺溜了，有十多亿中国人民等着你去烦，你就不用来烦我了。”

en: I figure life is a gift and I don't intend on wasting it. You never know what hand you're going to get dealt next. You learn to take life as it comes at you.
cn: 我觉得生命是一份礼物,我不想浪费它,你不会知道下一手牌会是什么,要学会接受生活。

en: We all have moments of desperation. But if we can face them head on, that's when we find out just how strong we really are.
cn: 我们都有绝望的时候，只有在勇敢面对时，我们才知道我们有多坚强。

en: Progress is the activity of today and the assurance of tomorrow .
cn: 进步是今天的活动、明天的保证。

en: If they throw stones at you, don't throw back, use them to build your own foundation instead.
cn: 如果别人朝你扔石头，就不要扔回去了，留着作你建高楼的基石。

en: It’s better to be alone than to be with someone you’re not happy to be with.
cn: 宁愿一个人呆着，也不要跟不合拍的人呆一块。

en: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift, that is why it’s called present！
cn: 昨天已成为历史，明天是未知的，而今天是上天赐予我们的礼物，这就是为什么我们把它叫做现在！

en: Persistence is the common trait of anyone who has had a significant impact on the world.
cn: 坚持是世界上每个有建树的人共有的品质。

en: A single hand that wipes tears during failures is much better than countless hands that come together to clap on success.
cn: 失败时有人伸出一只手来为你擦泪，会好过成功时无数人伸手为你鼓掌。

en: You can learn great things from your mistakes when you aren't busy denying them.
cn: 当你不再急于否认错误时，你就学到了重要的一课。

en: There are more things between heaven and earth than are dreamt of in your philosophy.
cn: 在这天地间有许多事情是人类哲学所不能解释的。

en: Land? Land is a ship too big for me. It’s a woman too beautiful, it’s a voyage too long, a perfume too strong, it’s music I don’t know how to make.
cn: 陆地？对我来说，陆地是艘太大的船，是位太美的美女。是条太长的航程，是瓶太香的香水，是篇无从弹奏的乐章。

en: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.-- Mark Twain
cn: 保持身体健康的唯一办法，就是吃点你不想吃的，喝点你不想喝的，以及做点你不愿做的事情。——马克·吐温

en: I can accept defeat but could not accept to give up .
cn: 我可以接受失败，但不能接受放弃.（迈克尔·乔丹座右铭）

en: Behind the fear of an ideal you, you create the fear, you can beat him.
cn: 恐惧的背后有一个理想的你，恐惧是你自己创造，你也可以打败他。

en: We learn to let go of things and people that hurt us in the past and just move on. For life is all about moving on.
cn: 我们学着放开过去伤害我们的人和事，学着只向前看。因为生活本来就是一往直前的。

en: Never regret anything because at one time it was exactly what you wanted.
cn: 不要后悔做任何事情，因为曾经有个时候，那正是你想要的。

en: A soldier would rather face a firing squad a thousand times over than just once have to look his own colleagues in the eye knowing he had failed them.
cn: 一名军人宁愿被行刑队枪毙一千次，也不愿让战友看见自己逃命的背影。

en: Be confident with yourself and stop worrying what other people think. Do what's best for your future happiness.
cn: 对自己要自信，别再管其它人怎么想了，为了未来幸福全力以赴吧！

en: The greatest contest is always with the enemy within,and that battleground can be the loneliest place on earth.
cn: 同自己内心的敌人斗争永远是最艰苦的，那片战场也是地球上最孤独的地方。

en: Whenever you feel like criticizing any one, just remember that all the people in this world haven’t had the advantages that you’ve had.
cn: 每当你觉得想要批评什么人的时候，你切要记着，这个世界上的人并非都具备你禀有的条件。

en: Real dream is the other shore of reality.
cn: 真正的梦就是现实的彼岸。

en: Every man dies, not every man really lives.
cn: 任何人都将会死去，然而并不是每个人都真真正正的活过。

en: Life's a little bit messy. We all make mistakes. No matter what type of animal you are, change starts with you.
cn: 生活总会有点不顺意，我们都会犯错。天性如何并不重要，重要的是你开始改变。

en: To be a person who knows how to be silent and always keep aspiring.
cn: 做一个适时懂得缄默而始终持有骨架的人。

en: I am a slow walker,but I never walk backwards.
cn: 我走得很慢，但是我从来不会后退。

en: I don't want to be the next Michael Jordan, I only want to be Kobe Bryant.
cn: 我不想和别人一样，即便这个别人是乔丹。

en: I believe I am.Born as the bright summer flowers.Do not withered undefeated fiery demon rule.
cn: 我相信自己，生来如同璀璨的夏日之花。不凋不败，妖冶如火。

en: For I know that my Redeemer lives, and that at the last he will stand up on the earth; and after my skin has been thus destroyed, then in my flesh I shall see God.
cn: 我知道我的救赎主活着，末了必站在地上。我这皮肉灭绝之后，我必在肉体之外得见上帝。--（《旧约·约伯记》第19章）

en: This moment nap, you will have a dream. But this moment study, you will interpret a dream.
cn: 此刻打盹，你将做梦；而此刻学习，你将圆梦。

en: The most important thing in any relationship is not what you get but what you give. In any case, the giving of love is an education in itself.
cn: 最重要的不是你得到什么而是给了什么。任何情况下，爱的付出本身就是一门学问。（Eleanor Roosevelt）

en: Hard work never killed anybody. But why take the risk.
cn: 努力工作不会导致死亡，不过我不会用自己去证明。

en: The power of the wind is at your command.The balance of power must be preserved.
cn: 风之化身听候您的差遣！力量的均衡必须维持！

en: I'm just a little bit caught in the middle. Life is a maze and love is a riddle, I don't know where to go, can't do it alone.
cn: 我有点儿左右两难，生活是座迷宫，爱是个谜，我不知道该去哪儿，我一个人做不到。

en: My flower is ephemeral, and she has only four thorns to defend herself against the world． And I have left on my planet, all alone！
cn: 我的花生命是短暂的，她只有四根刺可以保护自己，抵御世界，我却将她独自留在我的星球上了！

en: People die, but books never die. No man and no force can abolish memory.
cn: 人会死亡，书却无朽。没有任何人可以丢弃记忆。--富兰克林·罗斯福

en: Never let fear or shame keep you from celebrating the unique people that you are.
cn: 绝不要让害怕或羞怯，阻止你欣赏自己的独一无二。（Kristen Anderson-Lopez）

en: Only those who attempt the absurd can achieve the impossible.––Albert Einstein
cn: 只有那些努力完成荒谬的事才有可能实现不可能。--爱因斯坦

en: Make up your mind to act decidedly and take the consequences. No good is ever done in this world by hesitation.
cn: 下定决心，果断行动，并承担后果。在这世界上犹豫不决成就不了任何事。

en: Mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
cn: 妈妈说生活就像一盒巧克力，你永远都不知道你会得到什么。（《阿甘正传》

en: Money is not everything. There's MasterCard.
cn: 钞票不是万能的, 有时还需要信用卡。

en: He cheated death. No, he made a promise to death that he didn't keep.
cn: 他欺骗了死神。不，应该说是他向死神做出了承诺，却没有遵守诺言。--电影《恐怖游轮》

en: Fear of death is worse than death itself.
cn: 畏惧死亡比死亡本身更糟糕。--《红与黑》

en: And when we come together, combine the light that shines within. There is nothing we can't do, there is no battle we can't win.
cn: 当我们在一起时，光会更亮。没有什么是我们做不了的，没有我们赢不了的比赛。

en: The most important quality for an investor is temperament, not intellect.
cn: 投资人最重要的品质不是智慧，而是性情。--巴菲特

en: A great many people think they are thinking when they are merely rearranging their prejudices.
cn: 很多人觉得他们在思考，但实际上只是重新安排自己的偏见。（William James）

en: It is not in the still calm of life, or in the repose of a pacific station, that great characters are formed.
cn: 伟大的人格，不会形成于平静的生活，或无风的太平洋港。（Abigail Adams）

en: Mental attitude plays a far more important role in a person's success or failure than mental capacity.
cn: 对于一个人的成功与失败，态度所扮演的角色比能力更重要许多。

en: Happiness belongs to  those who dream dreams and are ready to pay the price to make them come true.
cn: 快乐属于那些敢于梦想，并且时刻准备去实现梦想的人。（Leon Suenens）

en: In a world that's changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
cn: 在一个瞬息万变的世界里，不冒任何险是唯一保证会失败的策略。（Mark Zuckerberg）

en: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
cn: 朋友是了解你的全部且仍然爱你的人。（Elbert Hubbard）

en: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
cn: 如果我看得比其他人远，那是因为我站在巨人的肩膀上。（Isaac Newton）

en: Readers are plentiful. Thinkers are rare.
cn: 阅读的人很多，但思考的人很少。（Harriet Martineau）

en: Our greatest enemies, the ones we must fight most often, are within.
cn: 我们最大的敌人和最常遇到的敌人，就在我们的心里。（Thomas Paine）

en: Live out of your imagination, not your history.
cn: 以你的想像，不是你的过去来生活。（Stephen Covey）

en: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
cn: 别让过去之事占据今天太多时间。（Will Rogers）

en: Find something you're passionate about and keep tremendously interested in it.
cn: 善于发现自己的喜好，并对它保持极大兴趣。（Julia Child）

en: The very best thing you can do for the whole world is to make the most of yourself.
cn: 你能为世界做最好的事，就是完全发挥自己的才能。（ Wallace Wattles）

en: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
cn: 重要的是不要停止疑问，好奇心有其存在的理由。（Albert Einstein）

en: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying. To the best you can do everyday.
cn: 你不一定要获胜，但你必须不断尝试，每天表现你最好的一面。（Jason Mraz）

en: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
cn: 世上最美好的事物看不着也摸不到，它们只能用心感觉。（Helen Keller）

en: Truly, would you not for less than that make the tour around the world?
cn: 讲真，难道人们真的不可能用更短的时间来环游地球一周吗？--《环游地球80天》

en: It is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live an imitation of somebody else’s life with perfection.
cn: 不完美地走自己的命运比完美地模仿别人的生活还要好。（The Bhagavad Gita）

en: In your pursuit of your passions, always be young. In your relationship with others, always be grown-up.
cn: 追求兴趣时保持年轻，与人相处时保持成熟。(Tom Brokaw)

en: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
cn: 快乐的艺术是由平凡提取快乐的能力。（Henry Ward Beecher）

en: The great thing in the world is not so much where we stand as in what direction we are moving.
cn: 这世界的美好之处不在于我们所处的位置，而在于我们所要到达的远方。

en: Protect your innocence. Our innocence allows us to do what the practical mind prohibits.
cn: 保护你的纯真，它让我们有勇气去做实际心态所不允许的事。（Vin Diesel）

en: Action is the real measure of intelligence.
cn: 行动是智慧的真正衡量标准。（Napolean Hill）

en: Making someone happy is perhaps the humblest way of approaching happiness.
cn: 获取快乐的最简单方法或许就是让他人感受到你的快乐。

en: There are many more people trying to meet the right person than to become the right person.
cn: 很多人想遇到对的人，而不是让自己成为对的人。（Gloria Steinem）

en: Rejoice in hope, be patient in tribulation.
cn: 从希望中得到欢乐，在苦难中保持坚韧。

en: Do not quench your inspiration and your imagination. Do not become the slave of your model.
cn: 不要熄灭你的灵感及想像，不要成为你楷模的奴隶。--梵高

en: Sentimental children forever whining about how bitterly unfair your lives have been. Well,it may have escaped you notice, but life isn't fair.
cn: 你这个令人失望多愁善感的小子，只会苦涩地抱怨生活多不公平。你可能没有注意到，生活本来就是不公平的。

en: Life is made up of small pleasures. Happiness is made up of those tiny successes.
cn: 生活中有很多小确幸，那些看似微不足道的收获，却正是快乐之所在。（Norman Lear）

en: I’ve probably earned the right to screw up a few times. I don’t want the fear of failure to stop me from doing what I really care about.
cn: 或许偶尔弄糟一切，但我不希望对失败的恐惧阻碍我做真正想做的事。（Emma Watson）

en: Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment. Full effort is full victory.
cn: 满足感在于不断的努力，而不是现有成就。全心努力定会胜利满满。（Mahatma Gandhi）

en: You can't be brave if you've only had wonderful things happen to you.
cn: 如果你只经历过美好，何来勇敢？（Mary Tyler Moore）

en: You never saw a very busy person who was unhappy.
cn: 你从没见过一个忙碌的人不快乐。（ Dorothy Dix）

en: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
cn: 别让你不能做的事妨碍到你能做的事。（John Wooden）

en: Visualize this thing that you want, see it, feel it, believe in it. Make your mental blue print, and begin to build.
cn: 想你所想，去看、去感受、去相信。心里画一个蓝图，并努力让它绚烂多彩。（Robert Collier）

en: Home. I'll go home. And I'll think of someway to get him back. After all, tomorrow is another day.
cn: 家，我会回家，想办法让他回来。不管怎样，明天又是全新的一天。--《飘》

en: For life goes not backward nor tarries with yesterday.
cn: 生命不会后退，也不在过去停留。（纪伯伦）

en: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
cn: 爱是当另一个人的快乐影响你自己的快乐。（Robert Heinlein）

en: Make each day count by setting specific goals to succeed, then putting forth every effort to exceed your own expectations.
cn: 每天设定一个目标，然后努力做到完美，甚至超乎你的想象。

en: There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there –you must go beyond them.
cn: 没有所谓的极限，看似险难的高原，你不是待在那里，而是超越它。

en: If all else remained, and he were annihilated, the universe would turn to a mighty stranger. I should not seem a part of it.
cn: 如果你不在了，无论这个世界有多么好，它在我眼里也只是一片荒漠，而我就像是一个孤魂野鬼。--《呼啸山庄》

en: Once there were no two hearts so open, no feelings so in harmony. Now we are strangers, worse than strangers, for we may never become acquainted.
cn: 曾经的相濡以沫，到如今的形同陌路，甚至还不如路人，一切都回不去了。--简·奥斯汀《劝导》

en: It matters not what you are thought to be, but what you are.
cn: 重要的不是别人怎么看你，而是你是怎样的人。(Publilius Syrus)

en: Making millions of  friends is not a miracle. The miracle is to make a friend who will stand by you when millions are against you.
cn: 朋友无数也敌不过当所有人都弃你而去时，有一个能坚定地站在你身旁。

en: The loving person makes other people feel good, and he is usually a happy person himself.
cn: 有爱心的人让人感到舒服，而他自己通常也是个快乐的人。（Benjamin Spock）

en: Instead of complaining about it, I'm just gonna go in every day and give it my all.
cn: 与其抱怨不停，不如卯足劲儿全力去做好它。--《生活大爆炸》

en: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying. To the best you can do everyday.
cn: 你不一定要获胜，但你必须不断尝试，每天表现你最好的一面。（Jason Mraz）

en: I love three things in the world, the sun, the moon and you. The sun for the day. The moon for the night and you forever.
cn: 世之万物，吾爱有三：一曰为日，一曰为月，一曰为汝。日出昼也，月升夜也，爱汝恒也！

en: It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things.
cn: 不做孤注一掷的事是智慧的表现。（Henry David Thoreau）

en: Done is better than perfect.
cn: 期望完美往往抵不过完成一件事。（Sheryl Sandberg）

en: Govern your thoughts when alone, and your tongue when in company.
cn: 闲谈勿论人非，静坐常思己过。

en: The man who attracts luck carries with him the magnet of preparation.
cn: 吸引好运的人，总是在时刻准备着。（Clifton Fadiman）

en: Don't tell me how hard you work. Tell me how much you get done.
cn: 你有多努力无需多谈，重要的是你完成了多少计划之中的事。（James Ling）

en: Oliver went up to the master, with his bowl in his hand. He felt very frightened, but also desperate with hunger.
cn: 奥利弗站了起来，手里捧着碗，胆战心惊地朝管事的走了过去。他极度饥饿又心存恐惧。

en: The secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
cn: 人生成功的秘密在于，当机会来临时，他已准备好。（Benjamin Disraeli）

en: Every new day begins with possibilities. It's up to us to fill it with the things that move us toward progress and peace.
cn: 以无限的可能性开始每一天。我们本身决定着这一天是否进步或安心。（Ronald Wilson Reagan）

en: It is impossible to win the great prizes in life without running risks.
cn: 不冒险，怎么能赢得人生中的种种精彩？（Theodore Roosevelt）

en: The most wonderful thing about love is that it turns you and me to us.
cn: 爱情中最美好的事，莫过于你和我，最终成为我们。

en: The harder you fall, the higher you bounce.
cn: 跌得越重，反弹得就越高。

en: Time erodes all such beauty, but what it cannot diminish is the wonderful workings of your mind, your humor, your kindness and your moral courage.
cn: 时间可以吞噬一切，但它丝毫不能减少的是你伟大的思想、幽默、善良和勇气。--《小妇人》

en: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.
cn: 你能给别人的最好礼物，是无条件的爱与包容。（Brian Tracy）

en: Much effort, much prosperity.
cn: 越努力，越幸运。（Euripides）

en: Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.
cn: 感恩生活中所有，是所有富足的基础。（ Eckhart Tolle）

en: And if God had gifted me with some beauty and much wealth, I should have made it as hard for you to leave me, as it is now for me to leave you.
cn: 如果上帝赋予我美貌和财富，我一定要使你难以离开我，就像现在我难以离开你。--《简爱》

en: When a man has put a limit on what he will do, he has put a limit on what he can do.
cn: 当一个人为自己将做的事设限，他也为自己能做的事设限。（Charles M. Schwab）

en: In every triumph, there's a lot of try.
cn: 每个胜利背后都有许多尝试。（Frank Tyger）

en: That there was no room for unhappiness as long as I was free.
cn: 只要我是自由的，便没有不快乐的时刻。--《消失的女孩》

en: It is precisely the possibility of realizing a dream that makes life interesting.
cn: 有机会实现梦想让人生变得有趣。（Paulo Coelho）

en: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadow.
cn: 保持面朝阳光，你将不会见到阴暗。（Helen Keller）

en: Adventure is a state of mind and spirit. It comes with faith, for with complete faith, there is no fear of what faces you in life or death.
cn: 冒险是一种心态和精神。与之而来的是绝对的信念，这样无论生死，都无所畏惧。（Jacqueline Cochran）

en: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
cn: 美，可以从一个人的眼神中看到，但更重要的，它来自于内心。

en: Any activity becomes creative when the doer cares about doing it right, or better.
cn: 当你专注把事情做好，或做得比原来更好，任何事情都可以创新。（John Updike）

en: You aspire to do great things? Begin with little ones.
cn: 想成就大事，就要从小事开始。（Augustine of Hippo）

en: It is a rough road that leads to the heights of greatness.
cn: 崎岖不平的道路将通往伟大崇高之地。（Lucius Annaeus Seneca）

en: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
cn: 要么书写值得阅读的事情，要么做值得被书写的事情。（Benjamin Franklin）

en: Never reject an idea, dream or goal because it will be hard work. Success rarely comes without it.
cn: 绝不要因为怕辛苦而拒绝一个想法、梦想或是目标，成功的路上难免伴随辛苦。（Bob Proctor）

en: You don't overcome challenges by making them smaller but by making yourself bigger.
cn: 想要克服困难，不是把困难最小化，而是自己努力变得更强大。（John C. Maxwell）

en: Life is too short to waste. Dreams are fulfilled only through action, not through endless planning to take action.
cn: 人生短暂，怎能虚度！梦想要靠行动来实现，绝非无终止的计划。（David J. Schwartz）

en: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak. Courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
cn: 人不仅需要勇气站起来说话，也需要勇气坐下来倾听。（Winston Churchill）

en: True liberty is to have power over oneself in all things.
cn: 真正的自由是在所有时候都能控制自己。--蒙田

en: If one cannot enjoy reading a book over and over again, there is no use in reading it at all.
cn: 如果一个人并不能享受阅读的乐趣，那阅读这件事就毫无意义可言。（Oscar Wilde）

en: You manifest what you believe, not what you want.
cn: 在你身上所体现的，是你所相信的东西，而非你所想要的东西。（Sonia Ricotti）

en: Confidence, never deny yourself of it, for it costs you nothing and leads to great things.
cn: 一定要时刻保持自信，它不花你一毛钱但可以带你至很棒的境界。（Vin Diesel）

en: Most people spend more time and energy going around problems than in trying to solve them.
cn: 大多数人都把时间和精力浪费在了问题本身，而不是试着解决问题。（Henry Ford）

en: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
cn: 若想得到你从未拥有的东西，你得愿意做你从未做过的事。（Thomas Jefferson）

en: You can fail at what you don't want, so you might as well take a chance on doing what you love.
cn: 做不想做的事可能会失败，倒不如给自己一个机会做你爱做的事。（Jim Carrey）

en: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
cn: 当我们表达感谢时，我们绝不能忘记感恩的最高形式不是说出的话，而是实际的作为。（John Kennedy）

en: One always has time enough, if one will apply it well.
cn: 人总是有足够的时间，如果他好好利用。--歌德

en: The most difficult thing is the decision to act. The rest is merely tenacity.
cn: 最困难的是下决定，剩下的就要坚持了。（Amelia Earhart）

en: Sometimes, the perfect person for you is the one you least expect.
cn: 有时候，最适合你的人，恰恰是你最没有想到的那个人。--《傲慢与偏见》

en: A man, as a general rule, owes very little to what he is born with - a man is what he makes of himself.
cn: 一般而言，天生的能力对人的一生影响不大，真正影响他一生的是如何造就自己。（Alexander Graham Bell）

en: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
cn: 聪明但没有抱负，有如没有翅膀的鸟。（Salvador Dali）

en: Happiness hides in life's small details. If you're not looking, it becomes invisible.
cn: 快乐隐藏在生活的细节里，不留意就难以察觉。（Joyce Brothers）

en: Go placidly, amid the noise and the haste, and remember what peace there may be in silence.
cn: 怡然行走于喧嚣繁忙中，莫忘寂静中或有之平和。

en: The only way to survive was to enjoy the good moments and not dwell too much on the bad.
cn: 生活，就应该享受美好的时刻，切莫执着于不好的瞬间。

en: Great works are performed not by strength, but by perseverance.
cn: 成大事者，凭毅力而非气力也。（Samuel Johnson）

en: We all have our own life to pursue, our own kind of dream to be weaving, and we all have the power to make wishes come true, as long as we keep believing.
cn: 我们都有自己要追求的人生，自己要编织的梦想，我们都有能力实现愿望，只要我们持续相信。（Louisa May Alcott）

en: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
cn: 你从来都不会成为输家，除非你停止尝试。（Mike Ditka）

en: Life is a series of collisions with the future. It is not the sum of what we have been, but what we yearn to be.
cn: 生活就是一连串与未来的碰撞，它不是我们过去的总和，而是我们对于未来的渴望。（Jose Ortega y Gasset）

en: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world. The unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself.
cn: 理性的人让自己适应世界；非理性的人坚持让世界适应自己。(George Bernard Shaw)

en: In order to do something you've never done, you have to become someone you've never been.
cn: 为了做你从没做过的事，你必须成为另外一个人。（Les Brown）

en: The course of true love never did run smooth.
cn: 真爱无坦途。--莎士比亚《仲夏夜之梦》

en: The conditions of conquest are always easy. We have but to toil awhile, endure awhile, believe always, and never turn back.
cn: 克服困难的条件一直都很简单。我们只需要努力一会儿、坚持一会儿、永远保持信念，且绝不折返。（ Lucius Annaeus Seneca）

en: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe that it is possible.
cn: 实现“不可能”的唯一办法就是相信它是可能的。--《爱丽丝漫游奇境记》

en: There are three constants in life…change, choice and principles.
cn: 生活中有三样是不变的：改变，选择和原则。

en: If you're quiet, you're not living. You've got to be noisy and colorful and lively.
cn: 生活，没必要太过安静。只有喧闹、多姿多彩且活泼生动才能算是真正的生活。（Mel Brooks）

en: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
cn: 被击垮通常只是暂时的，但如果你放弃的话，就会使它成为永恒。（Marilyn vos Savant）

en: Losing is a learning experience. It teaches you humility. It teaches you to work harder. It's also a powerful motivator.
cn: 失败是一个学习经验，它教你谦逊，让你更努力，它也是一个强大的激励来源。（Yogi Berra）

en: The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest men of past centuries.
cn: 读好书，如同与先哲们交谈.（Rene Descartes）

en: People who live the most fulfilling lives are the ones who are always rejoicing at what they have.
cn: 永远对所拥有感到欣喜的人，是生活最富足的人。（Richard Carlson）

en: Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life.
cn: 你的人生主要不是取决于生活带给你什么，而是你带何种态度至生活里。（Khalil Gibran）

en: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
cn: 人们常说某些事会随时间改变，但事实上你必须自己改变它们。（Andy Warhol）

en: The only limits in our life are those we impose on ourselves.
cn: 生活中的唯一限制是我们加诸在自己身上的。（Bob Proctor）

en: Many people lose the small joys in the hope for the big happiness.
cn: 很多人希望获得大的快乐，因而错失小的乐趣。（Pearl Buck）

en: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly. What's essential is invisible to the eyes.
cn: 一个人只有用心去看，才能看到真实。事情的真相只用眼睛是看不见的。--《小王子》

en: I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat.
cn: 我能奉献的没有其它，只有热血、辛劳、眼泪与汗水。（ Winston Churchill）

en: All I am, or can be, I owe to my angel mother.
cn: 我之所有，我之所能，都归功于我天使般的母亲。(Abraham Lincoln)

en: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire, the size of your dream, and how you handle disappointment along the way.
cn: 成功是由你欲望的力量，梦想的大小，以及你如何处理一路上的失望来衡量的。（Robert T.Kiyosaki）

en: To do nothing is the way to be nothing.
cn: 没有任何行动是通往一事无成的途径。（Nathaniel Hawthorne）

en: Life gives us choices…you either grab on with both hands and just go for it, or you sit on the sidelines.
cn: 人生有很多选择… 你不是双手握住索性跟着走，就是坐在一旁观看。（Christine Feehan）

en: You make me happier than I ever thought I could be. And if you'll let me, I will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way.
cn: 你给了我难以想像的幸福。如果你愿意，我愿意用我的一生让你感受到同样的幸福。--《老友记》

en: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
cn: 时间与耐心是最强大的两个战士。(Leo Tolstoy)

en: The difference in winning and losing is most often…not quitting.
cn: 赢和输的区别在于，大部分的时候….不要放弃。（Walt Disney）

en: Mind and Hand.
cn: 理论与实践并重。--麻省理工学院校训

en: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate.
cn: 我宁可做我爱做的事而失败，也不要做我讨厌的事而成功。（George Burns）

en: Successful people don't have fewer problems. They have determined that nothing will stop them from going forward.
cn: 成功的人也会遇到很多问题，他们只是坚信没有东西可以阻止他们前进。（Ben Carson）

en: When the going gets tough, the tough gets going．
cn: 艰难之路，唯勇者行。（Caroline Seebohm）

en: Cease to struggle and you cease to live.
cn: 生命不止，奋斗不息。（Thomas Carlyle）

en: Happiness lies not in the mere possession of money. It lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
cn: 幸福不在于拥有金钱，而在于获得成就时的喜悦以及产生创造力的激情。

en: Today, give a stranger one of your smiles. It might be the only sunshine he sees all day.
cn: 今天，给一个陌生人送上你的微笑吧。很可能，这是他一天中见到的唯一的阳光。（H.Jackson Brown Jr.）

en: Reading makes a full man, conference a ready man, and writing an exact man.
cn: 阅读使人充实，交谈使人机智，写作使人精确。（培根）

en: Happiness is within. It has nothing to do with how much applause you get or how many people praise you. Happiness comes when you believe that you have done something truly meaningful.
cn: 快乐是发自内心的。它与你获得了多少掌声，赢得了多少赞扬无关。快乐的真正意义在于，你相信，自己所奋斗的一切都有意义。

en: A mother's voice is the most beautiful sound in the world.
cn: 世界上有一种最美丽的声音，那便是母亲的呼唤。（但丁）

en: A beautiful form is better than a beautiful face; a beautiful behavior than a beautiful form.
cn: 美丽的外形胜于美丽的脸蛋，美丽的举止胜于美丽的外形。（Ralph Waldo Emerson）

en: Genius only means hard-working all one's life .
cn: 天才只意味着终身不懈的努力。 (俄国化学家，门捷列耶夫)

en: The principal thing in this world is to keep one's soul aloft.
cn: 人生在世，首要大事就是保持灵魂的高尚。（Gustave Flaubert）

en: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
cn: 实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。（Franklin D. Roosevelt）

en: A new day will come. And when the sun shines, it will shine out the clearer...Folk in these stories had lots of chances of turning back, they kept going because they trust that's some good in this world.
cn: 崭新的一天将会来临，太阳也会散发出更明亮的光芒。这些故事中的主角，有很多机会半途而废，但他们永往直前，因为他们相信这世上一定存在着善良。--电影《指环王·双塔奇兵》

en: A man can succeed at almost anything for which he has unlimited enthusiasm.
cn: 无论何事，只要对它有无限的热情你就能取得成功。（C. M. Schwab）

en: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
cn: 那些听不见音乐的人认为那些跳舞的人疯了。（尼采）

en: Home is the place where, when you have to go there,they have to take you in.
cn: 无论何时何地,家永远是向游子敞开大门的地方。(Frost Robert)

en: Made weak by time and fate, but strong in will. To strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield.
cn: 尽管被时间消磨，被命运削弱，依旧去奋斗、探索、寻求，而不屈服。--丁尼生《尤利西斯》

en: There are two things to aim at in life: first, to get what you want; and ,after that, to enjoy it , only the wisest of mankind achieve the second.
cn: 人的一生有两大目标：第一，得到你想要的东西；第二，享有你得到的东西。只有最聪明的人才能实现第二目标。（P. Smith Logan）

en: Pride relates more to our opinion of ourselves, vanity to what we would have others think of us.
cn: 骄傲多数情况下，无非是我们对自己的看法，但虚荣却指的是我们过于看重其他人对我们的评价。--电影《傲慢与偏见》

en: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.
cn: 现实仅仅是一种假象，挥之不去得假象。（阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦）

en: A great secret of success is to go through life as a man who never gets used up.
cn: 成功的秘诀是：经历人生，就像一个永远不会疲惫的人。（史怀哲）

en: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
cn: 即便是再微小不过的事情，你也要用心去做，这就是成功的秘密。（斯瓦米·悉瓦南达）

en: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself; to be conquered by yourself is of all things most shameful and vile.
cn: 战胜自己是最首要、最伟大的胜利，无法克制自己是最令人羞愧、最可怜的失败。（柏拉图）

en: There is no doubt that good things will come, and when it comes, it will be a surprise.
cn: 毋庸置疑，好的事情总会到来。而当它来晚时，也不失为一种惊喜。--电影《托斯卡纳艳阳下》

en: Goals are not only absolutely necessary to motivate us. They are essential to really keep us alive.
cn: 我们不仅仅需要目标来保持前进的动力。我们需要有目标才能真正活下去。（Robert H. Schuller）

en: No spring nor summer beauty hath such grace, as I have seen in one autumnal face.
cn: 无论是春天的俏还是夏天的美，都没有秋天的这份优雅。（John Donne）

en: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
cn: 悲观主义者在每个机会里看到困难；乐观主义者在每个困难里看到机会。（温斯顿‧邱吉尔）

en: We all have our time machines. Some take us back, they're called memories. Some take us forward, they're called dreams.
cn: 我们都有自己的时光机。带我们回到过去的，叫回忆；带我们前往未来的，叫梦想。（杰瑞米·艾恩斯）

en: No matter what label is thrown your way, only you can define yourself.
cn: 不管你被贴上什么标签，只有你才能定义你自己。--电影《丑女也有春天》

en: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time. It is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
cn: 为做过的事而产生的悔恨会因时间而被慢慢平抚；为没做过的事而后悔却是无法被平抚的。（西德尼·哈里斯）

en: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
cn: 我总是对新的一天充满喜悦，这是一次新的尝试、一个新的开始，翘首以待，黎明之后或是惊喜。（约翰·博因顿·普里斯特利）

en: Thankfulness is the beginning of gratitude. Gratitude is the completion of thankfulness. Thankfulness may consist merely of words. Gratitude is shown in acts.
cn: 感恩始于感谢之心，谢意正好完成了感恩。感恩也许只是些许的文字，感谢却要以行动去表达。（亨利·弗雷德里克·埃米尔）

en: As I began to love myself, I found that anguish and emotional suffering are only warning signs that I was living against my own truth. Today, I know, this is "AUTHENTICITY".
cn: 当我真正开始爱自己，我才认识到，所有的痛苦和情感的折磨，都只是提醒我：我的生活违背了自己的本心。今天我明白了，这叫做“真实”。--卓别林《当我开始爱自己》

en: There is nothing noble in being superior to some other man. The true nobility is in being superior to your previous self.
cn: 优于别人，并不高贵，真正的高贵应该是优于过去的自己。（海明威）

en: Celebrate what you've accomplished, but raise the bar a little higher each time you succeed.
cn: 庆祝你所取得的成就，但在每次成功后，把标准再拉高一点。（米娅·哈姆）

en: Happiness always looks small while you hold it in your hands, but let it go, and you learn at once how big and precious it is.
cn: 你把幸福捧在手里，看似微不足道，一旦放手，你便立刻感觉到它的重要与珍贵。（玛克西姆·高尔基）

en: As long as you don't care about gains and losses, life is not what can not be overcome.
cn: 只要不计较得失，人生便没有什么不能克服。（海明威）

en: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
cn: 益友、良书和一颗宁静的心，这就是理想的生活。（马克·吐温）

en: Those who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, then he can really change the world.
cn: 那些疯狂到以为自己能改变世界的人，才能真正改变世界。（史蒂夫•乔布斯）

en: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
cn: 为达成任何有意义的事，需要三个关键条件，第一是努力，第二是坚持，第三是常理判断。（托马斯‧爱迪生）

en: Luck is not chance, it's toil. Fortune's expensive smile is earned.
cn: 幸运不是偶然，而是靠努力。命运之神昂贵的微笑是靠努力赢得的。（埃米莉·狄更生）

en: It eluded us then, but that's no matter. Tomorrow, we will run faster, stretch out our arms farther, and one fine morning.
cn: 梦想尽管躲避我们吧，无关紧要！明天，我们会跑得更快，伸展得更远，又将是一个晴朗的早晨。--电影《了不起的盖茨比》

en: I was not looking for my dreams to interpret my life, but rather for my life to interpret my dreams.
cn: 我不想用梦想来注解人生，我要用人生来诠释我的梦想。（美国作家，苏珊·桑塔格）

en: Cleverness is a gift while kindness is a choice. Gifts are easy - they’ re given after all. Choices can be hard.
cn: 聪明是一种天赋，而善良是一种选择。天赋得来容易——毕竟，它们是与生俱来的，但选择往往很困难。（杰夫·贝佐斯）

en: I was struggling to keep up some of the time and the scenery was going past way too fast and close at times.
cn: 我努力跟上时间的脚步，因为眼前的风景有时逝去得太快。（约翰·邦德）

en: To acquire the habit of reading is to construct for yourself a refuge from almost all the miseries of life.
cn: 养成读书的习惯，就是为自己建造一处几乎可以逃避生活中苦难的庇护所。（英国剧作家，威廉·萨默塞特·毛姆）

en: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
cn: 幸福人生的三要素是：有所为、有所爱、有所希望。(英国散文家，约瑟夫·艾迪生)

en: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
cn: 如果我们总是等待，改变永远不会到来。自己才是我们在等的那个人，才是我们在等的那个改变。（奥巴马）

en: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
cn: 但人不是为失败而生的。一个人可以被毁灭，但不能被打败。 --海明威《老人与海》

en: A man is not old as long as he is seeking something. A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
cn: 只要一个人还有追求，他就没有老。直到后悔取代了梦想，一个人才算老。（美国演员，约翰·巴里莫尔）

en: Do not, for one repulse, forgo the purpose that you resolved to effect.
cn: 不要只因一次挫败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的梦想。（莎士比亚）

en: For what it's worth, it's never too late, or in my case, too early, to be whoever you want to be. There's no time limit, start whenever you want.
cn: 一件事无论太晚或者太早，都不会阻拦你成为你想成为的那个人。这个过程没有时间的期限，只要你想，随时都可以开始。--电影《返老还童》

en: How many loved your moments of glad grace. And loved your beauty with love false or true. But one man loved the pilgrim soul in you. And loved the sorrows of your changing face.
cn: 多少人爱过你昙花一现的身影，爱过你的美貌，以虚伪或真情，惟独一人曾爱你那朝圣者的心，爱你哀戚的脸上岁月的留痕。--叶芝《当你老了》

en: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
cn: 我爱光明，因它为我指引道路；我也愿忍受黑夜，因它让我看到星辰。（奥格·曼狄诺）

en: You know some birds are not meant to be caged. Their feathers are just too bright.
cn: 你知道，有些鸟儿是注定不会被关在牢笼里的，它们的每一片羽毛都闪耀着自由的光辉。--电影《肖申克的救赎》

en: Ordinary people merely think how they shall spend their time. A man of talent tries to use it.
cn: 普通人只想到如何度过时间，而有才能的人会设法利用时间。(德国哲学家，亚瑟·叔本华)

en: Man is always more than he can know of himself. Consequently, his accomplishments, time and again, will come as a surprise to him.
cn: 人们总是比所了解的自己还强，因此，人们的成就，将一再超出自己的意料。（戈洛·曼）

en: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future. It is something you design for the present.
cn: 快乐不是你延后将来要做的事，而是你计划现在要做的事。（励志作家，吉姆．罗恩）

en: Youth is not a time of life. It is a state of mind. It is not a matter of rosy cheeks, red lips and supple knees. It is a matter of the will, a quality of the imagination, a vigor of the emotions.
cn: 青春不是芳华年少，而是一种心境；青春不是桃花红颜、盈盈朱唇、轻柔体态，而是积极的心志，丰富的想象，炙热的感情。（塞缪尔）

en: The greater the struggle, the more glorious the triumph.
cn: 挑战愈艰巨，胜利愈辉煌。（励志演说家，尼克‧胡哲)

en: Do what makes you happy, be with who makes you smile, laugh as much as you breathe, and love as long as you live.
cn: 做让你开心的事，和让你开心的人在一起，让笑如呼吸般频繁，让爱像生命一样长久。（雷切尔·安·努内斯）

en: If you have great talents, industry will improve them. If you have but moderate abilities, industry will supply their deficiency.
cn: 如果你很有天赋，勤勉会使其更加完善；如果你能力一般，勤勉会补足其缺陷。（乔舒亚·雷诺兹）

en: The key to a happy life is to accept you are never actually in control.
cn: 幸福生活的关键是要接受你永远无法真正掌控一切的现实。--电影《侏罗纪公园》

en: Better not to ignore the past but learn from it instead. Otherwise, history has a way of repeating itself.
cn: 最好不要忽略过去，而是从中得到些教训，否则 历史会不断重复上演。--《绯闻女孩》

en: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
cn: 艰难的时光不会太久，但坚强的人会走到最后。（罗伯特·舒勒）

en: Nature gives you the face you have at 20, it is up to you to merit the face you have at 50.
cn: 二十岁的美丽是天生的，五十岁的魅力是修养而得的。（加布里埃·香奈儿）

en: Friend is someone who can see the truth and pain in you even when you are fooling everyone else.
cn: 真正的朋友就是，当你蒙蔽了所有人的眼睛，也能看穿你真实的样子和心底的痛楚。《绝望主妇》

en: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
cn: 设计目标是将愿景清晰化的第一步。（美国励志演说家，安东尼·罗宾）

en: Home is the only hiding place of human shortcomings and failures in the world, it also hides the sweet love. --Bernard Shaw
cn: 家是这个世界上唯一能隐藏人类缺点与失败的地方，它也隐藏着甜蜜的爱。(萧伯纳)

en: Life is about choices. Some we regret. Some we're proud of. We are what we choose to be. -Graham Brown
cn: 生活就是不断地选择。有些选择会让我们后悔，有些选择却又让我们感到自豪。但不管怎样，我们应该选择自己的人生。

en: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself. --Franklin D. Roosevelt
cn: 唯一能够让我们恐惧的，就是恐惧本身。

en: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.--Benjamin Disraeli
cn: 行动不一定总能带来快乐，但什么都不做就绝无快乐可言。

en: When you want to succeed, you should use persistence as your good friend.
cn: 当你希望成功，当以恒心为良友。（爱迪生）

en: Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.
cn: 当你有了动力，设定了目标并势如破竹般地为此而奋斗，人生便有了意义。（莱斯‧布朗）

en: You may not be the most luminous of people, but as a conductor of light, you are unbeatable.
cn: 或许你不是最闪闪发光的那个，但是作为光的传递者，你也一样会举世无双。《神探夏洛克》

en: We do not need magic to transform our world. We carry all the power we need inside ourselves already.--J.K.Rowling
cn: 我们不需要魔法来改变世界，因为我们的内心就已经拥有了所有力量。

en: Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity.
cn: 命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。（尼克松）

en: Few things are impossible in themselves, and it is often for want of will, rather than of means, that man fails to succeed.
cn: 事情很少有根本做不成的，之所以做不成，与其说是条件不够，不如说是由于决心不够。（法国作家，罗切福考尔德）

en: We cannot do great things on this earth, only small things with great love.--Mother Teresa
cn: 我们无法在这个世界上做什么伟大的事情，但我们可以带着伟大的爱去做一些小事。

en: Accept the things you cannot change. Have the courage to change the things you can.
cn: 不能改变的事，要学会接受，而能够改变的事就要勇于行动。电影《正义联盟》

en: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
cn: 仅仅活着是不够的，我们还需要有阳光、自由，和一点花的芬芳。（安徒生）

en: Pride relates more to our opinion of ourselves, vanity to what we would have others think of us.
cn: 骄傲多半是我们对自己的估价，但虚荣却牵涉到我们希望别人对自己的看法。《傲慢与偏见》

en: May there be enough clouds in your life to make a beautiful sunset.
cn: 愿你生命中有够多的云翳，来造成一个美丽的黄昏。—冰心《谈生命》

en: When things go wrong, running away is not the answer. You have to find within yourself a  way to handle it.
cn: 当遇到困难的时候，逃避并不是答案。你必须自己想办法去解决。《快乐的大脚2》

en: Success is the ability to go from one failure to another with no loss of enthusiasm.
cn: 成功是，你一次又一次失败，却仍没有失去热情。(Winston Churchill)

en: Everybody does stupid things, it shouldn't cost them everything they want in life.
cn: 人人都会犯傻，不该因此剥夺他们全部的生活。《豪斯医生》

en: If you do not learn to think when you are young, you may never learn.
cn: 如果你年轻时不学会思考，那就永远不会。(爱迪生)

en: Worry is a total waste of time. It doesn't change anything. All it does is steal your joy and keep you very busy doing nothing.
cn: 担心纯属浪费时间，又改变不了什么。它只会偷走你的快乐让你很忙却什么也解决不了。

en: The only person you should compare yourself to, is the person you were yesterday.
cn: 唯一能够和你相比较的，就是那个曾经的自己。

en: We're all traveling through time together, every day of our lives. All we can do is do our best to relish this remarkable ride.
cn: 我们生活的每一天，都在穿越时空，我们所能做的，就是尽其所能，珍惜这趟不平凡的旅程。《时空恋旅人》

en: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
cn: 我们重复的行为造就了我们。因此，优秀不是一个行为，而是一种习惯。(亚里士多德)

en: The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time.
cn: 关于未来最美好的事就是它总有一天会到来。(林肯)

en: God gave you them shoes to fit you, so put them on and wear them.
cn: 上帝给了你属于你的鞋子，请系好鞋带，整装待发。(Eminem-Beautiful Lyrics)

en: Not everything is meant to be. But everything is worth a try.
cn: 不是所有事情都能如愿以偿，但是任何事情都值得尝试。

en: Learn from every mistake, because every experience, particularly your mistakes, are there to teach you and force you into being more of who you are.
cn: 要从错误中吸取教训，因为你的每一次经历、尤其是你犯下的错误，都将帮助你、推动你更好地做自己。(Oprah Winfrey)

en: My heart was pounding the whole time. It was the most erotic moment of my life. Up until then, at least.
cn: 当时我的心一直像小鹿乱撞，那应该是我这辈子最性感的一刻了，至少在此之前没有过。《泰坦尼克号》

en: When you finally let go of the past, something better comes along.
cn: 当你最终放开了过去，更好的事就会到来。

en: Our lives are brief, that's why it's important to search for meaning.
cn: 人的一生如此短暂，因此，找到活着的意义至关重要。《绝望主妇》

en: Learn from the mistakes of others. You can never live long enough to make them all yourself.
cn: 从别人的错误中学习，因为你无法什么都亲身经历一次。(Groucho Marx)

en: For without progress there will be stagnation and decay.
cn: 如果没有进步，就会停滞，就会衰败。《哈利波特与凤凰社》

en: The most important thing in life will always be the people in this room, right here, right now.
cn: 生活中最重要的就是屋檐下的人，就在此时，就在此地。《速度与激情7》

en: Don't judge people by their covers. Most of their books are still being written.
cn: 不要根据封面评判一个人，他们的人生还在书写。

en: If it is important to you, you will find a way. If not, you'll find an excuse.
cn: 如果你认为重要，总会想到办法。如果你认为不重要，总会找理由。

en: You must continue to dream the wild dream that you dreamed when you were young.
cn: 你必须不停地追逐年轻时的疯狂梦想。(Mike Tomlin)

en: It doesn't matter what they call you. It's the deeds that make the man.
cn: 他们怎么叫你并不重要，重要的是你自己要怎么做。《兰戈》

en: The important thing in life is to have a great aim, and the determination to attain it.
cn: 生命中很重要的一件事就是有一个明确的目标，并且有努力实现它的决心。(歌德)

en: My dad was so full of life; anything with him was an adventure.
cn: 我父亲是如此的充满生命力，与他在一起做任何事都是一种探险。(兰迪·波许)

en: We all make our choices in life. The hard thing to do is live with them.
cn: 我们在人生中会作出许多选择，带着这些选择继续生活，才是人生中最难的一课。《妙笔生花》

en: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
cn: 爱是打开幸福之门的万能钥匙。(Oliver Wendel Holmes)

en: However mean your life is, meet it and live it; do not shun it and call it hard names.
cn: 不论你的生活多么糟糕，你要面对，要好好生活，不要躲避它，更别用恶言咒骂它。

en: True friends could get you through  the hard times, the sad times, and the confused times.
cn: 真正的朋友会与你一同度过困难、伤心和烦恼的时刻。

en: It is often in the darkest skies that we see the brightest stars.
cn: 往往在最黑暗的夜空里，我们看到最闪亮的星星。(Richard Evans)

en: Weep not for roads untraveled. Weep not for paths left alone 'cause beyond every bend is a long blinding end.
cn: 不要因未走过的旅途而哭泣，不要因错过的道路而伤心，因为每条岔路，都通向炫目的尽头。(Linkin Park)

en: Never let success get to your head and never let failure get to your heart.
cn: 不要让成功冲昏了头脑，也不要把失败记在心里。(Ziad K.Abdelnour)

en: You can't just sit there and wait for life to come to you. You have to go get it.
cn: 你不能无所事事的坐等着一切发生，你必须得自己努力争取。《吸血鬼日记》

en: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.
cn: 不到没有退路之时，你永远不会知道自己有多强大.(Bob Marley)

en: Sometimes it feels like, no matter how much success I have, it's not gonna matter until I find the right guy.
cn: 有时候我会觉得，如果没找到命中注定的那个人，不管有多成功都没意义。《在云端》

en: Growing old is mandatory; growing up is optional.
cn: 变老是注定的，而成长却是可以选择的。(Chili Davis)

en: In the moment when I truly understand my enemy, understand him well enough to defeat him, then in that very moment I also love him.
cn: 当我对敌人了解到足以让我打败他，那个时候，我也爱他。《安德的游戏》

en: It's not having what you want. It's wanting what you've got.
cn: 生活不是追求你想要的，而是想要你已拥有的。(Sheryl Crow)

en: Sometimes, all it takes is a little key to open the door to the wild side.
cn: 有时候，我们需要的只是一把小小的钥匙来打开通向户外的门。《绯闻女孩》

en: Life is full of inevitable highs and lows. Don't complain, don't explain, just maintain.
cn: 人生难免有起落，不抱怨，不解释，要做的就是坚持！

en: If your dream was big enough and you had the guts to follow it, there was truly a fortune to be made.
cn: 如果你的梦想足够远大，你又有勇气去追随它，财富便唾手可得。《奔腾年代》

en: Each soul is individual and has its own merits and faults.
cn: 每一个灵魂都是独特的，都有各自的美德和过错。《摆渡人》

en: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
cn: 过去无法改变，未来仍可掌控。(Mary Pickford)

en: Love is the thing that we're capable of perceiving that transcends dimensions of time and space.
cn: 爱，是一种力量，可以让我们能够超越时空的维度来感知它的存在。《星际穿越》

en: Never lose the child-like wonder.
cn: 永远不要失去孩童般的好奇心。(兰迪·波许)

en: It is not the destination so much as the journey, they say.
cn: 人家说目的地不重要，重要的是旅行的过程。《加勒比海盗》

en: Life never stops pushing forward. Stay focused and never slow down with regrets.
cn: 生活从来都不会停止向前，保持专注，别因为后悔而放慢脚步。

en: Everyone has his inherent power, which is easily concealed by habits, blurred by time, and eroded by laziness.
cn: 每个人都有潜在的能量，只是很容易被习惯所掩盖，被时间所模糊，被惰性所消磨。

en: The greatest risk in life is to risk nothing.
cn: 人生中最大的风险是过没有任何风险的生活。

en: Good luck is another name for tenacity of purpose.
cn: 好运不过是坚持不懈的结果。(Ralph Waldo Emerson)

en: You can have it all. You just can't have it all at once.
cn: 你可以拥有一切，只是不能一次就全到手。(Oprah Winfrey)

en: Laughter is timeless, imagination has no age, and dreams are forever.
cn: 笑容永不过时，想象力不分年龄，梦想永不终结。(Walt Disney)

en: All the beautiful sentiments in the world weigh less than a single lovely action.
cn: 世间所有美丽的情感抵不过一次实际行动。(James Russell Lowell)

en: Humility is not thinking less of yourself but thinking of yourself less.
cn: 谦卑不是看轻自己，而是不仅为自己着想。(C.S. Lewis)

en: Nothing really ever goes as planned.That's what makes life exciting.
cn: 没有什么事情可以预先安排，这就是生活令人兴奋的地方。

en: Courage is grace under pressure.
cn: 勇气就是压力下的优雅。(海明威)

en: Destiny is not a matter of chance. It's a matter of choice.
cn: 命运不在于机会，而在于选择。(William Jennings Bryan)

en: Individually we are weak, like a single twig but as a bundle we form a mighty faggot.
cn: 一人拾柴火不旺，众人拾柴火焰高。《辛普森一家》

en: Sometimes, the key to making progress is to recognize how to take that very first step. Then you start your journey.
cn: 有时候，进步的关键是要知道如何走出第一步，然后才能开启征程。《实习医生格蕾》

en: Take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly, and try another. But by all means, try something.
cn: 找到方法去尝试。如果失败了，坦然接受，尝试另外一种方法。但是无论如何，要去尝试。(Franklin D. Roosevelt)

en: Be true to yourself and everything will be fine.
cn: 做真实的自己，一切都会好起来的。(Ellen DeGeneres)

en: Constant dropping wears away a stone.
cn: 滴水穿石。

en: The brave may not live forever, but the cautious do not live at all.
cn: 勇气也许不能所向披靡，但胆怯根本无济于事。《公主日记》

en: As is a tale, so is life: not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters.
cn: 人生就像故事：不在于有多长，而在于有多精彩，这才是最重要的。(Seneca，古罗马政治家、哲学家)

en: Life's a climb, but the view is great.
cn: 生活就像一场攀登，但风景美不胜收。《汉娜·蒙塔娜》

en: A mother is not a person to lean on, but a person to make leaning unnecessary.
cn: 母亲不是赖以依靠的人，而是让你有能力不依靠的人。(Dorothy Canfield Fisher)

en: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
cn: 宁愿做事不完美，总比完美地不做事要好。(Robert Schuller)

en: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
cn: 成功者是坚持梦想不放弃的人。(Nelson Mandela)

en: A life with love will have some thorns, but a life without love will have no roses.
cn: 有爱的人生会有荆棘，但没有爱的人生将没有玫瑰。

en: We're here to put a dent in the universe.
cn: 我们存在，只为改变世界。(Steve Jobs)

en: Forward! That is the battle cry.
cn: 勇往直前才是我的作战口号。《纸牌屋》

en: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
cn: 领袖和跟风者的区别就在于创新。(Steve Jobs)

en: You can't reach for anything new, if your hands are still full of yesterdays junk.
cn: 如果你的双手仍被昨天的垃圾占据，你就无法获得任何新鲜的东西。

en: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
cn: 如果你爱生活，那就不要浪费时间，因为生活就是由时间组成的。(李小龙)

en: Whatever your mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
cn: 只要你想得到，只要你相信，就一定能做到！(拿破仑)

en: It's not the hours you put in your work that counts, it's the work you put in the hours.
cn: 工作效益不在于时间长短，而在于真正做了什么。

en: Life is a journey, not a destination.
cn: 人生就是一场旅行，而不是一个终点。(Ralph Waldo Emerson)

en: We should consider every day lost on which we have not danced at least once.
cn: 每一个不曾起舞的日子，都是对生命的辜负。(尼采)

en: A bend in the road is not the end of the road. Unless you fail to make the turn.
cn: 路上的转弯处不是路的终点，除非你没有转弯。(Helen Keller)

en: Life is simple. You make choices and you don't look back.
cn: 生活很简单，作出选择，不回头。《速度与激情3东京漂移》

en: We do what we have to do so that we can do what we want to do.
cn: 我们做了我们必须做的，所以才能做我们想做的。《伟大辩手》

en: You will never have what you like until you learn to like what you have.
cn: 要得到你喜欢的东西，应先学会喜欢你已有的东西。(歌德)

en: The reading of all good books is like a  conversation with the finest men of past centuries.
cn: 读好书，就如同和过去世界上最杰出的人谈话。(勒内·笛卡儿)

en: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you'll be able to see farther.
cn: 走到你能看到的最远处，当走到那，将能看得更远。(J. P. Morgan)

en: The size of a man may be measured by the size of the things that make him angry.
cn: 一个人的肚量取决于让他生气的事情的大小。(Adlai E. Stevenson)

en: Constantly talking isn't necessarily communicating.
cn: 说个不停不一定是交流。《美丽心灵的永恒阳光》

en: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
cn: 想提高就要改变，想达到完美就要不断改变。(温斯顿·丘吉尔)

en: The past can hurt. But from the way I see it, you can either run from it, or learn from it.
cn: 过去是痛楚的，但我认为你要么可以逃避，要么可以向它学习。《狮子王》

en: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe.
cn: 一个人必须在社会中不断挣扎求存，才能不被茫茫人海湮灭。(尼采)

en: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
cn: 一个人的出身并不重要，重要的是他成长为什么样的人！《哈利波特与火焰杯》

en: For me life has got to be an adventure. Enjoy every minute of it.
cn: 在我看来，人生应该是一场冒险。享受每一分钟的生活！(保罗·沃克)

en: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.
cn: 带着希望旅行比到达目的地更美好。(Robert Louis Stevenson)

en: Never let the demands of tomorrow interfere with the pleasures and excitement of today.
cn: 永远别让明天的期待，影响你享受今天的时光。(Meredith Willson)

en: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.
cn: 成功很简单：在合适的时间用恰当的方式做正确的事。(Arnold H. Glasgow)

en: Don't tell me I can't do it. Don't tell me it can't be done.
cn: 别告诉我这我做不到，别告诉我这事做不成。《飞行者》

en: Don't worry if you have had a bad day. We each have a reset button. It's called tomorrow.
cn: 如果你今天过得很糟糕，别担心，我们都有一个重置按钮叫做“明天”。

en: We dream and we build. We never give up; we never quit.
cn: 我们有梦想，努力去实现。绝不放弃，绝不退缩。《美国骗局》

en: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
cn: 不去尝试你已经熟练以外的事，你不会得到成长。(Ralph Waldo Emerson)

en: We all have moments of desperation. But if we can face them head on, that's when we find out just how strong we really are.
cn: 我们都有绝望的时候，只有在勇敢面对时，才知道自己有多坚强。《绝望主妇》

en: The true nobility is in being superior to your previous self.
cn: 真正的高贵在于超越过去的自己。(海明威《真正的高贵》)

en: The will to survive is extraordinary and at times overwhelming, capable of fashioning some form of normality even out of the darkest hour.
cn: 人的求生意志是无比强烈的，有时甚至压倒一切，这意志使他们即便身处最黑暗的时刻也能坦然面对。《老牌政敌2：国会危机》

en: Insanity is doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
cn: 疯狂就是重复做一件事，并期待不同的结果。(爱因斯坦)

en: Some of us get dipped in flat, some in satin, some in gloss. But every once in a while, you find someone who's iridescent, and when you do, nothing will ever compare.
cn: 有些人会渐露平庸，有些人会小有所成，还有人会出类拔萃，但偶尔才会遇上一个光彩夺目的人，当你真正遇到，就发现其他都是浮云。《怦然心动》

en: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
cn: 享受生活，快快乐乐，这才是最重要的。

en: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
cn: 请记住：现在的每一天都是一年中最美好的一天。(Ralph Waldo Emerson)

en: We mustn't fear daylight just because it almost always illuminates a miserable world.
cn: 我们绝对不能因为阳光几乎只会照耀出一个悲惨的世界而惧怕它。(比利时超现实主义画家勒内·马格里特)

en: There is no absolute success in the world, only constant progress.
cn: 世界上的事没有绝对成功，只有不断的进步。(Jonathan Swift)

en: The best way to achieve a goal is to devote 100% of your time and energy to it.
cn: 达到目标的最好办法就是投入自己百分百的时间和精力去完成它。《生活大爆炸》

en: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
cn: 不做准备，那就准备失败吧。(Benjamin Franklin)

en: Nothing is so common-place as to wish to be remarkable.
cn: 没有什么比希望不平凡而更平凡的了。(莎士比亚)

en: Don't complain about things you are not willing to work hard to change.
cn: 如果你不愿意努力去改变，那就不要抱怨。

en: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
cn: 庆祝成功是好事，但汲取失败的教训更重要。(比尔·盖茨)

en: It's always helpful to learn from your mistakes because then your mistakes seem worthwhile.
cn: 从错误中学习总是有益的，你的错误将因此变得值得。(Garry Marshall)

en: Don't waste life in doubts and fears.
cn: 不要把生命浪费在疑惑和恐惧中。(爱默生)

en: Being happy doesn't mean that everything is perfect. It means that you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
cn: 快乐不代表一切都很完美，它意味着你决定去忽略那些不完美。

en: There is no substitute for hard work. First in, last out.
cn: 努力没有替代品，最先开始，最后离开。(Mary Callahan Erdoes)

en: Only by coming to grips with difficulty can you realize your full potential.
cn: 唯有直面及处理困难，你才能够发挥自己最大的潜能。(戴高乐将军)

en: Everyone needs to have a good laugh now and then, to see the funny side of things, and to laugh at himself.
cn: 人有时总需要开怀大笑，看看事情轻松的一面，并懂得自嘲。(李光耀)

en: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode, but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul.
cn: 女人的美丽不是表面的，应该是她的精神层面。(奥黛丽·赫本)

en: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
cn: 任何成就都是从决定尝试开始。

en: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
cn: 事情不会自己发生，事情都是人做出来的。(美国前总统约翰.肯尼迪John F. Kennedy)

en: Those who bring sunshine into the lives of others, cannot keep it from themselves.
cn: 给别人的生命带来阳光的人，自己也会享有阳光。(J.M. Barrie)

en: Confidence comes not from always being right but not fearing to be wrong.
cn: 信心不是来自永远正确，而是来自不怕犯错。(Peter T. Mcintyre)

en: What we do during our working hours determines what we have; what we do in our leisure hours determines what we are.
cn: 工作时间做的事，决定我们拥有什么；闲暇时间做的事，决定我们成为哪种人。(George Eastman)

en: The only limit is your imagination.
cn: 唯一的局限是你的想象力。

en: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
cn: 人生，你遇到的事情占一成，你怎样对待这些事情占九成。

en: Where there is kindness, there is goodness, and where there is goodness, there is magic.
cn: 哪里有仁爱，哪里就有善行，哪里有善行，哪里就有奇迹。《灰姑娘》

en: Man only likes to count his troubles, but he does not count his joys.
cn: 人们只喜欢计算他们的麻烦，不喜欢计算他们的喜悦。(Fyodor Dostoevsky)

en: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second-best time is today.
cn: 种树的最佳时间是20年前，仅次于它的最佳时间是现在。

en: The best accessory a girl can own is confidence.
cn: 女生最好的饰品就是自信。

en: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
cn: 对于肯尝试的人来说，没有什么是不可能的。

en: If a man empties his purse into his head, no man can take it away from him.
cn: 把财富转化为知识，没人能夺走它。(Benjamin Franklin)

en: Never underestimate your power to change yourself. Never overestimate your power to change others.
cn: 永远不要低估你改变自己的能力，也不要高估你改变别人的能力。(H. Jackson Brown)

en: Sometimes it is the people who no one imagines anything of who do the things that no one can imagine.
cn: 有时候正是人们以为的无用之人成就了无人敢想之事。《模仿游戏》

en: The highest reward for man's toil is not what he gets for it, but what he becomes by it.
cn: 努力的最大回报不在于你获得什么，而在于你成为什么。(John Ruskin)

en: Most of us fail in our efforts at self-improvement because our schemes are too ambitious and we never have time to carry them out.
cn: 我们大多数人想自我完善却遭到失败，这是因为我们的规划过于宏大，而又根本没有时间去实施。《新概念英语第三册--新年的决心》

en: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear.
cn: 勇者并非无所畏惧，而是判断出还有比恐惧更值得重视的东西。

en: You can't make the same mistake twice. The second time you make it, it's no longer a mistake. It's a choice.
cn: 一个人不可能犯两次同样的错误。第二次还这样做，已经不再是犯错，而是你的选择。

en: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
cn: 成大事的唯一途径就是热爱自己在做的事。若你还没找到，那就继续追寻吧，不要停下来。(Steve Jobs)

en: The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention.
cn: 最微小的行动胜过最伟大的打算。(John Burroughs)

en: However bad life may seem, there is always something you can do, and succeed at.
cn: 无论生活怎样坑爹，总有一些事情你可以做，也可以取得成功。(《万物理论》史蒂芬·霍金)

en: A vacation is like love - anticipated with pleasure, experienced with discomfort, and remembered with nostalgia.
cn: 放假就像谈恋爱：憧憬它的到来令人兴奋不已，拥有它时觉得不过如此， 等它结束了又会勾起无限怀念。

en: You are today where your thoughts have brought you; you will be tomorrow where your thoughts take you.
cn: 你的今天来自你过去的想法。而你的明天，产生自你现在的想法。(James Allen)

en: When you wake up in the morning complete the following statement: My goal is__.
cn: 每天早上起床的时候，就想想怎么填完整下面这句话：我的目标是__。

en: Obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
cn: 任何障碍不能阻挡你的前进。如果你遇上一堵墙，不要转身放弃，而是想办法爬过去、穿过去或者绕过去。(Michael Jordan)

en: I abhor the dull routine of existence.
cn: 我痛恨日复一日地寻常往复。《基本演绎法》

en: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
cn: 享受生活中的小事。总有一天当你暮然回首，你会发现，正是那些小事才是真正的大事。(Robert Brault)

en: If you want something you have never had, you must be willing to do something you have never done.
cn: 如果你想得到从未拥有过的东西，你就得去做从未做过的事。

en: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
cn: 微笑是一道弧线，却能把一切摆平。(Phyllis Diller)

en: The heart wants what it wants.
cn: 心之所欲无人能挡。《破产姐妹》

en: None of us can vow to be perfect. In the end all we can do is promise to love each other with everything we've got. Because love's the best thing we do.
cn: 没有人可以发誓做到完美，最后我们能保证的只有深爱彼此，倾尽所有。因为爱是最美好的事。《老爸老妈浪漫史》

en: Live beautifully. Dream passionately. Love completely.
cn: 活要活得美好，梦要梦得热烈，爱要爱得完整。

en: Satisfaction doesn't come from the outside, but from the inside.
cn: 真正的满足来自你的内心，而不是外界。

en: Everyone faces challenges in life. It's a matter of how you learn to overcome them and use them to your advantage.
cn: 每个人都会在生活中面对挑战。问题在于怎样学会克服挑战，再把这些经验转化成你的优势。

en: Yet if you were carrying scars...it meant you were still walking.
cn: 如果你身上伤痕累累，就证明你这个人还坚强地活着。

en: The best place to succeed is where you are with what you have.
cn: 通向成功的最佳状态，是立足于自己现在的位置，并用好自己手上的资源。

en: The struggle you're in today is developing the strength you need for tomorrow. Don't give up.
cn: 今天做的一切挣扎都是在为明天积蓄力量，所以别放弃！(Robert Tew)

en: Whatever you do, just don't make any rash decisions.
cn: 无论你想做什么，千万不要贸然行事。《生活大爆炸》

en: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
cn: 失败只是重新开始的机会，而这次你会更加明智。(美国汽车大王亨利·福特)

en: The nature of promises is that they remain immune to changing circumstances.
cn: 所谓承诺，就是无论环境如何变化也不受影响。《纸牌屋》

en: Stop worrying about the potholes in the road and enjoy the journey.
cn: 别再担忧路途上的颠簸起伏了，开始享受这趟旅程吧。(Babs Hoffman)

en: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
cn: 要赢得成功，你对成功的渴望必须超过你对失败的恐惧。(Bill Cosby)

en: Never doubt yourself. Never change who you are. Don't care what people think and just go for it.
cn: 别怀疑自己，别改变自己，别在意别人怎么想，大胆去追求自己想要的。(Britney Spears)

en: Marriage changes you as a person in ways that you can't imagine.
cn: 婚姻会用一种你想象不到的方式改变你。《神探夏洛克》

en: When something bad happens, there's no point in wishing it had not happened. The only option is to minimise the damage.
cn: 如果糟糕的事已然发生，再去想要是没发生也没有意义。唯一的选择是把损失降到最小。《唐顿庄园》

en: You can't change the past, but you can ruin the present by worrying about the future.
cn: 你改变不了过去，但如果你过于忧虑未来，就会毁了现在。

en: Don't lose hope. You never know what tomorrow will bring.
cn: 别灰心，谁知道明天会有怎样的惊喜。

en: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind.
cn: 爱，不在眼里，它在心中。(莎士比亚《仲夏夜的梦》)

en: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
cn: 没有勇气冒险的人，将一事无成。

en: Life is like freshly fallen snow. Be careful where you walk because every step will show.
cn: 人生，就像一场新雪。请谨慎地走好每一步，因为每次落脚都会留下痕迹。(Neal Stephenson)

en: Everybody has difficult years, but a lot of times the difficult years end up being the greatest years of your whole life, if you survive them.
cn: 每个人都有苦逼的岁月。但大多数时候，这些苦逼的岁月最后会变成整个生命中最精彩的日子，只要你能挺过来。(Brittany Murphy)

en: Stand up for something, even if it means standing alone sometimes.
cn: 人要有所坚持，即便是有时候坚持意味着孤立无援。

en: True friendship isn't about being there when it's convenient; it's about being there when it's not.
cn: 真正的朋友不仅能有福同享，还能患难与共。

en: Let your dreams be bigger than your fears, your actions louder than your words, and your faith stronger than your feelings.
cn: 让梦想大于胆怯，让行动盖过言语，信念强于感觉。

en: There are no mistakes, only opportunities.
cn: 没有错误，只有机会。(Tina Fey)

en: When you know why you like someone, it's a crush. When you have no reason or explanation, it's love.
cn: 当你知道为什么喜欢一个人时，这是迷恋；当你没有原因的喜欢时，这是真爱！

en: I think we always end up where we're supposed to.
cn: 我觉得我们能在一起是上天注定的。 《传世》

en: Every single moment counts. When you add them all up, they equal your life.
cn: 每个时刻都很重要。把所有时刻加起来，就等于你的人生。(Susan Gale)

en: Life is short. There is no time to leave important words unsaid.
cn: 生命很短暂，重要的话不说就没机会了。

en: The size of your dreams must always exceed your current capacity to achieve them. If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.
cn: 你的梦想永远都要大于现在的能力范围。如果你没有被梦想吓到，说明你的梦想还不够大。(非洲第一位女总统Ellen Johnson Sirleaf )

en: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
cn: 能力决定了你能做什么，动机决定了你要做什么，态度决定了你会做成什么样。(Lou Holtz)

en: Love is a promise. Love is a souvenir. Once given, never forgotten. Never let it disappear.
cn: 爱是承诺，爱是纪念，一旦赋予永不被遗忘，莫让爱消失。(约翰·列侬)

en: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
cn: 无论何时，你设定新的目标或拥有新的梦想都为时不晚。(C.S.Lewis)

en: Be patient and tough; some day this pain will be useful to you.
cn: 做一个耐心而坚韧的人，现在的痛苦总有一天会为你所用。

en: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
cn: 我们生活中的许多失败，是因为人们在放弃的时候没有认识到他们距离成功有多么近。(托马斯·爱迪生)

en: Some people dream of success while others wake up and work hard at it.
cn: 有些人还在继续梦想成功时，另一些人却已经醒来努力为之奋斗了。

en: Sometimes silence expresses more than words do.
cn: 有时候，沉默比话语表达得更多。

en: My advice to you is to get married: if you find a good wife you'll be happy; if not, you'll become a philosopher.
cn: 我给你的建议是去结婚吧，如果娶了个贤妻，你会成为幸福的人；如果取了个悍妇，你会成为哲学家。(苏格拉底)

en: Work hard in silence. Let your success be your noise.
cn: 在沉默中努力，让成功自己发声。(Frank Ocean)

en: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
cn: 今天就开始改变你的生活。不要把赌注下在明天，快行动，别拖沓。(Simone de Beauvoir)

en: If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead you anywhere spectacular.
cn: 太容易的路，可能根本不能带你去任何地方。

en: Sometimes all doors may be closed for you, but remember, they aren't locked.
cn: 有时候，在你看来，所有的门似乎都关上了，但请记住，关上并不代表锁上。

en: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.
cn: 沟通最重要的是，听出潜台词。(Peter Drucker)

en: You are richer today if you have laughed, given or forgiven.
cn: 只要你今天笑过、给予过或宽恕过，你就比昨天更富有。

en: Life is measured by thought and action, not by time.
cn: 生命的价值是用思想和行为来衡量的，而不是寿命的长短。

en: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
cn: 人只能活一次，如果你能以正确的方式活着，一次足矣。(Mae West)

en: A man is but the product of his thoughts. What he thinks, he becomes.
cn: 人是思想的产物。心里想的是什么，就会变成什么样的人。--甘地

en: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure will turn to glorious success.
cn: 再多一点点毅力，多付出一点点努力，看似无望的失败也会转化成辉煌的成功。(Elbert Hubbard)

en: Even if we can't be together in the end, I'm glad you were a part of my life.
cn: 即使最后我们无法在一起，我依然会感激生命中有你。

en: Maybe it doesn't matter which road we embark on. Maybe what matters is that we embark.
cn: 或许，人生重要的不是我们走了哪条路，而是我们是否迈出了脚步。(Barbara Hall)

en: We all grow into the beautiful person that we're supposed to be. Some earlier, some later.
cn: 我们最终都会成为自己梦想成为的那个人，只是有些人早一些，有些人晚一些。

en: Calling somebody else fat won't make you any skinnier. Calling someone stupid doesn't make you any smarter. All you can do in life is try to solve the problem in front of you.
cn: 笑别人胖不能让自己瘦，说别人傻不能让自己聪明。你的人生就是解决自己面临的问题。《贱女孩》

en: Life doesn't get easier. It's you that do get stronger.
cn: 生活从未变得轻松，是你在一点一点强大。

en: Sometimes it takes a good fall to really know where you stand.
cn: 有时候需要狠狠摔一跤，才知道自己站在哪儿。(Hayley Williams)

en: Happiness is always knocking on your door and you just gotta let it in.
cn: 幸福总会敲门，你只需要开门让它进来。

en: Laughter is the tonic, the relief, the surcease for pain.
cn: 笑是滋补品，是缓解和终止痛苦的灵药。(查理·卓别林)

en: I must say a word about fear. It is life’s only true opponent. Only fear can defeat life.
cn: 这里必须说说恐惧，它是生活惟一真正的对手，因为只有恐惧才能打败生活。(Life of Pi)

en: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
cn: 只有那些甘愿冒险不断前行的人，才能够清楚的了解自己能走多远。(T.S.Eliot)

en: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
cn: 你能经历的最大冒险，就是过你梦想的生活。(Oprah Winfrey )

en: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
cn: 让梦想成真的最好方法就是先醒过来。

en: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.
cn: 人生两大选择：要么接受现状，要么接受改变现状的责任。(Denis Waitley)

en: They say at the end of your life, you regret the stuff you didn't do more than the stuff that you did.
cn: 别人都说，人到暮年，比起自己做过的事，会更后悔没有做过一些事情。《生活大爆炸》

en: Anything is possible, as long as you set your mind, heart and soul to it.
cn: 世界上没有做不到的事，只要你全心全意去做。

en: Enjoy when you can, and endure when you must.
cn: 该享受时纵情享受，该忍受时拼命忍受。

en: Crying is the refuge of plain women. Pretty women go shopping.
cn: 平庸的女人靠哭泣来逃避痛苦，而美丽的女人则去购物。(Oscar Wilde)

en: Nobody gets to live life backwards. Look ahead, that's where your future lies.
cn: 谁也不能回到过去。向前看，那才是你未来的所在。(Ann Landers)

en: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
cn: 我们都生活在阴沟里，但仍有人仰望星空。(王尔德)

en: To change who you are, change who you think you are.
cn: 想要改变自己，就要先改变你对自己的看法。

en: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
cn: 有的人在逆境中崩溃，有的人在逆境中创造奇迹。(William Arthur Ward)

en: If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure.
cn: 如果你竭尽全力，就没时间担心失败。(H. Jackson Brown, Jr.)

en: Every struggle in your life has shaped you into the person you are today. Be thankful for the hard times; they can only make you stronger.
cn: 你生命中的每次努力都成就了今天的你，感谢生命中那些艰难的岁月，是它们让你变得更强大。

en: The man who has never made a mistake will never make else.
cn: 从不犯错的人将一事无成。

en: Whatever is going to happen will happen, whether we worry or not.
cn: 该发生的总会发生，不管你是否为此焦虑。(Ana Monnar)

en: A healthy mind in a healthy body: that's the only way to get the most out of life.
cn: 健康的身体里要有健康的心智，这是拥有最佳生活的唯一方法。

en: The wind really chills me to the bone.
cn: 这寒风真是刺骨。

en: Sometimes, smiles are like band-aids. They cover up the pain but it still hurts.
cn: 有时，微笑就像创可贴，虽然掩盖住了伤口，但是依然感觉到痛。

en: If you want to be successful, it's just this simple. Know what you are doing. Love what you are doing. And believe in what you are doing.
cn: 如果你想要成功，这很简单：知道你在做什么，爱你做的事，相信你做的事。(Will Rogers)

en: Being simple is not settling for less, it is being satisfied with having just enough. Having enough is not longing for more, it is being content with having you by my side.
cn: 简约不是少，而是没有多余。足够也不是多，而是刚好你在。

en: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go. They merely determine where you start.
cn: 你的现状不能决定你的未来，只能决定你的起点。

en: Don't drive after drinking. I know you don't want to see me right now.--GOD
cn: 酒后别开车，我知道你还不想见到我。--上帝

en: In life, one step creates the next. Each day is of equal importance, no matter how good or bad. There is no moment in life that does not matter.
cn: 人生中，步步相随。无论好与坏，每一天都一样的重要。人生中没有一个时刻是无关紧要的。

en: Life is too short. Be sure that you have never had any regrets in your life.
cn: 人生短暂，一定不要给自己的人生留下什么遗憾。

en: Life always has many things to bring you down. But, what can really bring you down is that you don't manage your attitude.
cn: 生命中有很多事情足以把你打倒，但真正能把你打倒的是你的心态。

en: I love waking up in the morning not knowing what's gonna happen or, who I'm gonna meet, where I'm gonna wind up.
cn: 我喜欢早上起来时一切都是未知的，不知会遇见什么人，会有什么样的结局。《泰坦尼克号》

en: The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison with it, that was the miracle.
cn: 梦想总是跑在我前面。努力追寻它们，为了那一瞬间的同步，这就是动人的生命奇迹。(Anais Nin)

en: Life is like playing chess with God. Your moves are called Choices; his moves are called Challenges.
cn: 生活就像是跟老天下棋，对你而言，你走棋，那叫选择；老天走棋，那叫挑战。

en: A smile is the most beautiful curve on a woman's body.
cn: 微笑是女人身上最美的曲线。

en: You can't change what has already happened. So don't waste your time thinking about it. Move on, let go and get over it.
cn: 已经发生的事你也改变不了，就别浪费时间再想它了。前进，放手，忘了它，就这么回事。

en: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed on an equal or greater benefit.
cn: 每一次不幸、每一次失败、每一次心痛，都会孕育同样或更大的成功。(Napoleon Hill)

en: Happiness isn't about getting what you want. It's about loving and being grateful for what you have received.
cn: 幸福不是你想要什么，而是带着爱和感恩珍惜你已经得到的。

en: The greatest thing is, at any moment, to be willing to give up who we are in order to become all that we can be.
cn: 在任何时候，愿意放弃现在的自己，去成就最好的自己，都是一件伟大的事。(Max De Pree)

en: There is no fast track to success, and no highway to happiness.
cn: 成功没有快车道，幸福没有高速路。

en: The water is clear and the mountain is bright. The frost comes in at night. Trees are covered with deep scarlet leaves, mixed with yellow that is light.
cn: 山明水净夜来霜，数树深红出浅黄。(刘禹锡《秋诗二首》)

en: Miracles sometimes occur, but one has to work terribly hard for them.
cn: 奇迹有时候是会发生的，但是你得为之拼命地努力。(Chaim Weizmann, First president of Israel)

en: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn't take, relationships we were afraid to have, and the decisions we waited too long to make.
cn: 最终，我们只会后悔那些没抓住的机会，没勇气爱的人和太晚而未做出的决定。

en: It's not what you do once in a while, it's what you do day in and day out that makes the difference.
cn: 差异不是偶尔一回，而是日复一日形成的。(Jenny Craig)

en: There are no boundaries or barriers if two people are destined to be together.
cn: 如果两个人命中注定要在一起，那么就没有任何东西可以阻碍他们。(Julia Roberts)

en: The greatest revenge is to accomplish what others say you cannot do.
cn: 最大的报复就是做到别人认为你做不到的事。

en: You never know what you can do till you try.
cn: 不亲试一下，你永远不知道自己能够做什么。

en: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
cn: 挫折并非最惨痛的失败，真正的失败则是从未尝试。(George Edward Woodberry)

en: A leader does not impose a decision, he moulds it.
cn: 领导者不强加决定于他人，他促使一个决定成形。(Nelson Mandela)

en: I have to take one thing for granted: that I will love you, until the last breath leaves my body.
cn: 有件事我认为理所应当，就是我会永远爱你，至死不渝。《唐顿庄园》

en: Sometimes you have to do what's best for you and your life, not what's best for everyone else.
cn: 有时候，你必须做到最好，为了你和你的生活，而不是为别人。

en: Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
cn: 并不是你面对了，任何事情都能改变。但是你不面对，什么也改变不了。(James Baldwin)

en: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
cn: 今天你做好的事情，将改善你未来的每一天。(Ralph Marston)

en: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
cn: 平庸与卓越之间的差异，在于那一点点的额外努力。(Jimmy Johnson)

en: Making a million friends is not a miracle. The miracle is to make a friend who will stand by you when millions are against you.
cn: 交许许多多的朋友不是什么奇迹。真正的奇迹是当所有人都弃你而去的时候，还有一个朋友坚定的站在你身边。

en: You make millions of decisions that mean nothing and then one day your order takes out and it changes your life.
cn: 你每天都在做很多看起来毫无意义的决定，但某天你的某个决定就能改变你的一生。《西雅图不眠夜》

en: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.
cn: 任何停止学习的人都已经老了，无论是20岁还是80岁。坚持学习的人永远年轻，人生最美好的事就是保持年轻的心。

en: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
cn: 宁可曾经爱过而失败，也不要从来未曾有过一次爱。

en: It doesn't matter what others think of you. It only matters what you think of yourself.
cn: 不要太在意别人如何看待你；最重要的是你如何看待自己。

en: Weekends are like rainbows. They look good from a distance but disappear when you get up close to them.
cn: 周末就像彩虹。远远看上去很美，但一旦走近，它刷地就没了。

en: People who cannot find time for recreation are obliged sooner or later to find time for illness.
cn: 腾不出时间娱乐的人，早晚会被迫腾出时间生病。

en: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
cn: 要学会对拥有的一切怀有感恩之心。最终你会得到更多。如果你总是对那些没有得到的东西耿耿于怀，那么你永远也不会满足。

en: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple.
cn: 有时候问题很复杂，而答案却很简单。

en: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
cn: 生活一直都很简单，我们却总把它搞得很复杂。

en: Success, it is not the position where you are standing, but which direction you are going.
cn: 成功，不是你所站的位置，而是你要去的方向。（Oliver Wendell Holmes）

en: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don't need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself.
cn: 真正美好的事就是做自己，不需要被别人认可，只需要接受最真实的自我。(Thich Nhat Hanh)

en: You can finish the longest road step by step. But you may be unable to finish the shortest road if you have no action of striding.
cn: 再长的路，一步步也能走完；再短的路，不迈开双脚也无法到达。

en: Happiness lies in the consciousness we have of it.
cn: 幸福在于自知拥有幸福。

en: If someone wants you in their life, they'll make room for you. You shouldn't have to fight for a spot.
cn: 如果对方需要你，那么自然会为你腾出空间来。你不必为了在对方的生命里占有一席之地而苦苦挣扎。

en: The only way to get smarter is by playing a smarter opponent.
cn: 只有与智者对弈，才能增长智慧。（《国际象棋基础》）

en: The problems of your past are your business. The problems of your future are my privilege.
cn: 你的过去我不愿过问，那是你的事情；你的未来我希望参与，这是我的荣幸。《神探夏洛克》

en: The important thing in Life is not triumph, but the struggle; the essential thing is not to have conquered but to have fought well.
cn: 生活中最重要的事情不是胜利，而是奋斗；不是征服，而是拼搏。( Pierre de Coubertin )

en: Remember that adversity is not a dead end but a detour to a better outcome.
cn: 记住，逆境并不是尽头，而是更好结果的一个转角而已。

en: Sometimes you're flush and sometimes you're bust, and when you're up, it's never as good as it seems, and when you're down, you never think you'll be up again, but life goes on.
cn: 人生有起有落。起时，你不会在意；落时，你以为爬不起。但生命仍要继续。《美国毒枭》

en: The best things in life are free, like hugs, smiles, friends, kisses, family, love and good memories.
cn: 世间最美好的东西都是免费的，就像拥抱，微笑，朋友，亲吻，家庭，爱，美好回忆……

en: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
cn: 我们重复做什么，就会成为什么样的人，然后你会发现，优秀不是一种行为，而是一种习惯。(Aristotle)

en: I used to think the worst feeling was losing someone you love. But, I was wrong. The worst feeling is the moment you have lost  yourself.
cn: 之前我一直认为，世界上最悲伤的事情就是失去你深爱的人，但是我错了。世界上最悲伤的事情是你意识到，你迷失了自我。《吸血鬼日记》

en: Years may wrinkle the skin, but to give up enthusiasm wrinkles the soul.
cn: 岁月留痕，只及肌肤；激情不再，皱起心灵。

en: A fabulous breakfast matters more than anything else.
cn: 一顿美好的早餐比什么都重要。

en: I won't insult your intelligence by explaining it to you.
cn: 我就不给你解释了，省得说我侮辱你智商。《神探夏洛克》

en: The best thing in life is finding someone who knows all your mistakes and weaknesses and still thinks you're completely amazing.
cn: 生命中最美好的事就是找到那个知道你所有的错误和缺点，却依然认为你很棒的人。

en: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
cn: 没有人能回到过去重新开始，但你可以从今天开始创造一个新的结局。(Maria Robinson)

en: Believe that everything happens for a reason. Expect good things to come out of challenging experiences.
cn: 要相信凡事皆有因果，面对挑战才能有好事降临。

en: Failure is not falling down, but refusing to get up.
cn: 失败不是跌倒，而是拒绝爬起来。

en: Forget the risk and take the fall. If it's what you want, then it's worth it all.
cn: 忘记风险，敢于担当，如果是你想要的，值得一试！

en: It's not about who hurt you and broke you down. It's about who was always there and made you smile again.
cn: 重要的不是谁伤害了你，击垮了你，而是谁一直在你身边，让你重展笑颜。

en: I don't think anything is unrealistic if you believe you can do it.
cn: 我认为没有什么是不切实际，如果你相信自己做得到，就可能做得到。(Mike Ditka)

en: Winners are not those who never fail but those who never quit.
cn: 成功者不是从不失败，而是从不放弃。（Edwin Louis Cole）

en: Knowing after all the unreturned phone calls, broken-hearts, through the blunders and misread signals, through all the pain and embarrassment you never gave up hope.
cn: 经历无数次伤心、自作多情，和数不清的痛苦尴尬后，你依然相信真爱。《他没那么喜欢你》

en: Calmer heads will always prevail.
cn: 冷静才能致胜。《吸血鬼日记》

en: Life can be unfair sometimes, but that's no reason to give up on it.
cn: 有时候，生活是不公平的，但我们却没理由对此绝望。

en: Summer has come and passed. The innocent can never last. Wake me up when September ends.
cn: 夏天来了又走，纯真它从未停留，当九月结束时请你唤醒我。(Green Day LYRICS)

en: Life is just like a painting. Many things make it colorful and meaningful.
cn: 生活就像一幅画，许多事情赋予了生活色彩和意义。

en: Shared joy is a double joy; shared sorrow is half a sorrow.
cn: 快乐因分享而加倍，悲伤因分担而减半。

en: You have destroyed my ability to tolerate idiots.
cn: 你毁了我容忍蠢货的能力。《生活大爆炸》

en: If you want the best the world has to offer, offer the world your best.
cn: 你若想得到这世界最好的东西，先得让世界看到最好的你。(Neale Donald Walsch)

en: Better not to ignore the past but learn from it instead. Otherwise, history has a way of repeating itself.
cn: 最好不要忽略过去，而是从中得到些教训，否则，历史会不断重复上演。《绯闻女孩》

en: Do not worry about winning or losing; think of what you will gain.
cn: 别为输赢而纠结，想想你能收获什么吧。(M.F. Moonzajer)

en: It doesn't matter if the guy is perfect or the girl is perfect, as long as they are perfect for each other.
cn: 那个小伙子是否完美，或者那个姑娘是否完美都不重要，只要他们能珠联璧合。《心灵捕手》

en: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
cn: 成功在很大程度上似乎就是别人放弃后，你仍然坚持下去了。(WIlliam Feather)

en: Don't give up when you still have something to give, because nothing is really over until the moment you stop trying.
cn: 当你还能给予的时候别轻言放弃。只要你不放弃，一切皆有可能。

en: Life is tough, and if you have the ability to laugh at it you have the ability to enjoy it.
cn: 人生很艰难，如果你有笑对人生的能力，你就有享受人生的能力。(Salma Hayek)

en: It's not the load that breaks you down. It's the way you carry it.
cn: 将你击垮的不是压力，而是你承受压力的方式。

en: Only ever work on the thing that will have the biggest impact.
cn: 只去做那件影响最大的事情。(Jason Cohen)

en: The best makeup is Smile. The best jewelry is Modesty. The best clothing is Confidence.
cn: 最好的妆容是微笑，最好的饰品是谦虚，最好的衣裳是自信。

en: Never give up on something you really want. It's difficult to wait, but worse to regret.
cn: 永远不要放弃你真正想要的东西。等待虽难，但后悔更甚。

en: If everything seems under control, you're just not going fast enough.
cn: 如果一切看起来尽在掌控之中，那说明你跑得不够快。(Mario Andretti)

en: Why waste precious time dreaming when waking life is so much better?
cn: 醒着的生活如此美好，为何要把时间浪费在做梦上呢？《绯闻女孩》

en: Don't be jealous that people have done better than you. All you need to do is to keep breaking your own record every day, for success is a fight between you and yourself.
cn: 不要羡慕别人做得比你好，只需要每天打破自己的记录，因为成功是你和自己打仗。

en: The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and if they can't find them, make them.
cn: 取得成功的人，都是努力去寻找他们想要的机会，如果找不到，他们便自己创造。

en: We make a living by what we get,but we make a life by what we give.
cn: 生存依赖于我们得到什么，生活依赖于我们付出什么。(温斯顿·丘吉尔)

en: Even Achilles was only as strong as his heel.
cn: 再强大的人，能力也由他的短板来决定。《纸牌屋》

en: This is a big and beautiful world. Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born and never get to see any of it. I don't want to be most of us.
cn: 这个世界如此辽阔和美丽，而大多数人从生到死，都在同一个角落里不挪窝，没见识过别处的风景，我不想成为那种人。《权力的游戏》

en: Time is luck. So don't waste it living someone else's life, make yours count for something. Fight for what matters to you, no  matter what.
cn: 生即幸福，所以不要浪费生命为别人而活，要活出你自己的意义，为你热爱的事物奋斗，心无旁骛。

en: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
cn: 如果你不去追求你想要的，你永远也得不到。如果你不往前走，那只能在原地待着。

en: Your words fall like acid rain on the wounded petals of my heart.
cn: 你的一字一句都像是冷冷的酸雨在我破碎的心上胡乱地拍。《生活大爆炸》

en: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
cn: 和朋友在黑暗里同行，好过一人在光明中独步。(Helen Keller)

en: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
cn: 享受当下的快乐，因为这一刻正是你的人生。(Omar Khayyam)

en: People with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
cn: 有目标的人能够成功，因为他们知道他们要去哪。(Earl Nightingale)

en: Love is putting someone else's needs before yours.
cn: 爱就是把某个人看得比你自己重要。《冰雪奇缘》

en: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
cn: 预测未来的最好方式就是去创造它。

en: For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go.
cn: 对我而言，旅行的重点不是去哪里，而是出发。

en: Love is a lamp, while friendship is the shadow. When the lamp is off, you will find the shadow everywhere. Friend is who can give you strength at last.
cn: 爱情是灯，友情是影子，当灯灭了，你会发现你的周围都是影子。朋友是在最后可以给你力量的人。《当哈利遇见莎莉》

en: Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, it only saps today of its joy.
cn: 忧虑绝不会化解明天的不幸，它只会夺走今天的快乐。

en: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
cn: 梦想不会奇迹般地实现，它需要汗水、决心和努力去实现。(Colin Powell)

en: At twenty years of age, the will reigns; at thirty, the wit; and at forty, the judgment.
cn: 二十岁时起支配作用的是意志，三十岁时是机智，四十岁时是判断。( B. Franklin)

en: Persistence is the common trait of anyone who has had a significant impact on the world.
cn: 坚持是世界上成功人士共有的品质。

en: Today, forget your past, forgive yourself and begin again.
cn: 从今天起，忘记过去，原谅自己，重新开始。

en: There is only one success to be able to spend life in your own way.
cn: 只有一种成功：那就是能够用自己的方式度过一生。(Christopher Morley)

en: All success comes from tireless effort and pursuit, and all happiness comes from daily struggle and perseverance.
cn: 所有的成功都来自不倦的努力和奔跑；所有幸福都来自平凡的奋斗和坚持。

en: It takes anyone to stand by your side at your best. But it takes a special one to stand by your side at your worst.
cn: 在你鼎盛的时候，任何人都可能站在你这边；在你最低落的时候，站在你身边的只有那个特别的人。

en: When something or someone is no longer adding to your life, but subtracting from it - it's time to let go.
cn: 当一些人和事不是在给你的生命加分而是减分，是时候放手了。

en: Don't fear pressure, for pressure is what turns rough stones into diamonds.
cn: 不要怕压力，因为压力能把石头变成钻石。

en: Instead of being disappointed at where you are, think optimistically about where you are going.
cn: 与其对你现在所处的位置感到失望，不如乐观地想想你前进的方向。

en: Life isn't fair, but it's still good.
cn: 生活是不公平的，但还算过得去。

en: Believe what your heart tells you, not what others say. Your heart knows what's best.
cn: 相信你内心告诉你的，而不是别人说的。你的心知道什么是最好的。

en: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
cn: 平凡与非凡的差异仅在于那一点点额外的努力。(Jimmy Johnson)

en: Don't forget the things you once owned. Treasure the things you can't get. Don't give up the things that belong to you and keep those lost things in memory.
cn: 曾经拥有的，不要忘记。不能得到的，更要珍惜。属于自己的，不要放弃。已经失去的，留作回忆。《曾经》
